bill_title: Honoring and commending the Lennox Orioles High School Baseball Team as Class B State champions.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring and commending the Lennox Orioles High School Baseball Team as Class B State champions. WHEREAS, the Lennox High School Baseball team, led by Coach Drew Sweeter, made history by winning the school's first ever baseball state championship last spring; and WHEREAS, the team endured a tough season with several schedule changes and inconstant start times to many of the games during the season; and WHEREAS, the Orioles outscored opponents 18-4 throughout the state tournament using a fantastic display of pitching which helped them cap off an incredible season; and WHEREAS, the Orioles displayed excellent teamwork and effort for an impressive six runs to defeat the Dakota Valley Panthers in the state championship: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature congratulates the Lennox Orioles High School Baseball Team as Class B State champions.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring and commending the Lennox Orioles High School Baseball Team as Class B State champions. WHEREAS, the Lennox High School Baseball team, led by Coach Drew Sweeter, made history by winning the school's first ever baseball state championship last spring; and WHEREAS, the team endured a tough season with several schedule changes and inconstant start times to many of the games during the season; and WHEREAS, the Orioles outscored opponents 18-4 throughout the state tournament using a fantastic display of pitching which helped them cap off an incredible season; and WHEREAS, the Orioles displayed excellent teamwork and effort for an impressive six runs to defeat the Dakota Valley Panthers in the state championship: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature congratulates the Lennox Orioles High School Baseball Team as Class B State champions.
